title: Android Studio
description: I trying to adapt to this IDE because it is very powerful and has a lot of features for Kotlin and Jetpack Compose development since become Bangkit Cohort.

title: IntelliJ IDEA
description: Just like Android Studio, this IDE is the parent of any IDE in Jetbrains tools. I'm using this IDE in React web development and Flutter development with Dart.

title: Visual Studio Code
description: This is my main IDE for my development. I'm using on it since my first time know programming. It has a lot of extensions and features that make it customizable.

title: Postman
description: It is a reliable API client application and often helps me to test the APIs I create

title: Git
description: A popular tool that helps collaborate with teams in working on projects.
